channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: #HollywoodHills Hiker Rescue; INC#0457; 08:36AM; 1 Hollywood Sign; MAP: https://bit.ly/3whJCBQ; Firefighters are responding to an adult female hiker with an isolated lower extremity injury in a remote area of the Hollywood Hills. Rescuers on the ground and LAFD Air Ops are coordinating for a hoist operation and air transport to a local hospital. Nothing further.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC5 E227 E82 H4 H6 HA4 HA6 RA82 RH114 T27 UR27; CH7; 12; Lyndsey Lantz

KNOCKDOWN #SunValley Structure Fire; INC#0424; 07:57AM; 7744 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UbzRzk; Initial arriving companies found an encampment on fire exposing a commercial building. Firefighters quickly extinguished the outside fire, then entered the building to check for extension. No extension to structure found. LAFD resources will remain on scene for overhaul. LAPD notified for traffic control. No reported injuries. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E260 E289 E298 E60 E77 E81 E89 EM14 RA889 RA89 T60 T89 T98; CH9; 17; Lyndsey Lantz

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1245; 06:09PM; 11878 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3W1Jmno; #BroadwayManchester; Firefighters made access to the vacant 50' x 50' one-story building and found fire inside and burning up into the attic. Crews advanced hose lines inside, while others ascended ladders to ventilate the roof. Ultimately, it took 32 firefighters 19 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E57 E64 E65 RA264 RA64 RA864 SO1 T33 T64; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1245; 05:47PM; 11878 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3W1Jmno; #BroadwayManchester; Firefighters responded to a 50' x 50' one-story commercial building with smoke showing (site of a previous burn). Offensive mode.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E57 E64 E65 RA264 RA64 RA864 SO1 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Knockdown; INC#0080; 01:02AM; 15001 W Mission Hills Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/4aNcy63; #MissionHills; Firefighters responded to a one-story single-family home with heavy fire showing. Firefighters operated in the defensive mode (from the exterior only) to apply large amounts of water to the intense flames from around the perimeter of the structure. It took a total of 48 firefighters 45 minutes (1:47am) to extinguish the blaze. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 75; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC15 E275 E298 E474 E7 E75 E98 RA75 RA891 RA91 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#1523; 07:28PM; 6800 N Tampa Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/4b2hWBV; #Reseda; Firefighters responded to a two-vehicle collision resulting in five people injured. Crews set up treatment and transport for all five. Two adult females in moderate condition, two adult males in serious condition, and one juvenile (teenage) female in serious condition were taken to area hospitals by LAFD ambulances. Nothing further.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E273 E73 E93 EM14 EM15 EM17 RA100 RA104 RA73 RA83 RA84 RA93 T73; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange

Vehicle vs Pedestrians; INC#1876; 11:00PM; 524 S Alvarado St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4d3ctg4; #Westlake; Three patients have been transported by LAFD Paramedics after being struck by a vehicle. All three are in critical condition. Unknown age/gender/condition/circumstances. LAPD Inc #5056. Nothing further.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E11 E211 EM11 FR11 RA11 RA13 RA20 T11; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1742; 09:30PM; 529 W 90th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UloeqW; #VermontVista; Firefighters responded to a property no longer occupied by the owner, where three structures are located: a front house, guest house (or "back house"), and a detached garage. Crews found heavy fire showing from the small guest house, adjacent to the detached garage. Firefighters advanced hose lines to the rear of the property and quickly applied water to the flames threatening the nearby garage. It took 24 firefighters 15 minutes to quench the flames, protecting the adjacent garage from all but minor exterior damage. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E266 E33 E57 E64 RA264 RA57 RA857 RA864 SO1 T33 T66; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1742; 09:15PM; 537 W 89th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q9V0bQ; #VermontVista; PRELIM: One-story "back house" with fire showing to the rear of a one-story single-family home. A nearby detached garage is threatened. Offensive mode.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E266 E33 E57 E64 RA264 RA57 RA857 RA864 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0896; 01:08PM; 3184 Canyon Lake Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xzgIj9; #HollywoodHills; Firefighters are responding to an adult female hiker (approx 25 years old) with a lower extremity injury in a remote area of the Hollywood Hills. Rescuers on the ground have prepared her for a hoist and air transport. LAFD Air Ops will be performing a hoist operation and transporting her to a local hospital. Nothing further; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E76 H4 H6 HA4 HA6 RA97 RH114 T35; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange
